title: Strengthening Programming Practice Competencies: Development and Application of Science Learning Modules Through Absorptive Topic Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of absorption phenomena and compare the absorption capacities of various materials.
Learners can apply structured inquiry procedures to design absorption experiments and analyze results.
Learners can propose practical applications of absorption material properties in daily life.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
